title: Arlington House, The Robert  E. Lee Memorial: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture         Ranger Talk NPS  Welcome to Arlington House, The Robert E. Lee Memorial.  This house was the residence of Robert E. Lee and his family before the Civil War. The property is connected to many important figures, issues and events in United States History. To learn more about Memorial, click the links below. Virtual Tour People Stories
